comments.text: React is a great library for building user interfaces.
comments.author: Jane Doe

comments.text: If you want to know more about React, check out the official documentation.
comments.author: Alex M.

comments.text: Traditional website without React has many limitations.
comments.author: Chris P.

comments.text: Nodejs is a great platform for building APIs.
comments.author: Michael J.

comments.text: Compare to other backend technologies, Nodejs is much faster.
comments.author: Sarah L.

comments.text: Nodejs uses JavaScript, which makes it easier to learn for front-end developers.
comments.author: John D.

comments.text: Angular is another popular framework for building web applications.
comments.author: Daniel W.

comments.text: I would suggest React over Angular for most projects.
comments.author: Emma T.

comments.text: If you want to know more about Angular, check out the official documentation.
comments.author: Robert B.
